LanguageData.ARA_TrainShooting.label: Skill training (shooting)
LanguageData.ARA_TrainShooting.description: Trains the selected skill level. It costs nothing, does not produce anything, and simply gives you work experience points.\n\nSkill training is classified as a "basic" type of work. If you do not want your swarm to continuously train, it is recommended to lower the priority of that type of work.

LanguageData.ARA_TrainArtistic.description: Train the skill level of your choice. It costs nothing, you don't produce anything, you just gain work experience points.
